Summary: My brother was driving down Route 2 west in Euclid when he looked up at what he told me was a missile soon as he acknowledged the object swooped down at his vehicle disabling it rolled off the freeway blinded and in tears from fear
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother was driving down the freeway and he look out his window to see what he thought at first was a bright object in the sky moving at missile like speeds soon as he leaned forward to observe it the object swooped down at his vehicle and turned off his truck causing him to roll off of the freeway and also was blinded by it and called me in tears to report to me what just happened he was a mess in tears and to be honest terrified to go back outside he is a 6 foot 2 big guy who is not afraid of nothing and also does not believe in UFO's at all until last night.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Euclid
There were no other sightings in Euclid on or around November 6th 2012
